snippet: Survivors of a stampede after a New Year’s Eve fireworks display said Wednesday that makeshift barricades had prevented them from moving along a main boulevard.
abstract: Survivors of stampede in Abidjan, Ivory Coast, after New Year’s Eve fireworks display say that makeshift barricades had prevented them from moving along a main boulevard, causing crush that killed 61 people.
lead_paragraph: Survivors of a stampede after a New Year’s Eve fireworks display said Wednesday that makeshift barricades had prevented them from moving along a main boulevard.

headline.seo: Ivory Coast: Barricades Are Blamed for Stampede
headline.main: Ivory Coast: Barricades Are Blamed for Stampede
headline.print_headline: Ivory Coast: Barricades Are Blamed for Stampede
